description:
Coming from Ashfield, one day Becky becomes part of the staff of Miss Minchin`s Seminary. Being a rather clumsy person, she`s not much liked by the rest of the staff, least Miss Minchin herself. Becky herself is like a mirror of poverty to Sara, being mistreated and punished a lot. Becky is illiterate.
Sara is the only one who treats Becky like a person.
name: Becky
